import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; function AddUser(props) { const [name, setName] = useState(""); const [secondName, setSecondName] = useState(""); const [email, setEmail] = useState(""); const [password, setPassword] = useState(""); const [phoneNumber, setPhoneNumber] = useState(""); const [country, setCountry] = useState(""); const [city, setCity] = useState(""); const [street, setStreet] = useState(""); const [houseNumber, setHouseNumber] = useState(""); const [isPrivate, setIsPrivate] = useState(""); const [appartmentsNumber, setAppartmentsNumber] = useState(""); const [roleID, setRoleID] = useState(1); function sendValues() { if (!name || name == "" || !secondName || secondName == "" || !email || email == "" || !password || password == "" || !phoneNumber || phoneNumber == "" || !country || country == "" || !city || city == "" || !street || street == "" || !houseNumber || houseNumber == "") { window.alert("Заповніть всі поля"); return; } let body = { name: name, secondName: secondName, email: email, password: password, phoneNumber: phoneNumber, roleID: roleID, country: country, city: city, street: street, houseNumber: houseNumber, isPrivateHouse: isPrivate, appartmentsNumber: appartmentsNumber } debugger } return (
setName(event.target.value)} reguired />
setSecondName(event.target.value)} reguired />
setEmail(event.target.value)} reguired />
setPassword(event.target.value)} reguired />
setPhoneNumber(event.target.value)} reguired />
setCountry(event.target.value)} reguired />
setCity(event.target.value)} reguired />
setStreet(event.target.value)} reguired />
setHouseNumber(event.target.value)} reguired />
setIsPrivate(event.target.checked)} />
setAppartmentsNumber(event.target.value)} />
); } export default AddUser;
